/// <reference path="../../ref.d.ts" />
 
export interface IRadioMessagesScope extends ng.IScope {
    input: string;
    name: string;
}
 
export default class RadioMessages implements ng.IDirective {
 
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/radio/radioMessages-directive.html";
    public restrict = "E";
    public require = "^form";
    public transclude = true;
    public replace = true;
    public scope = {
        name: "@?"
    };
 
    public link(scope:IRadioMessagesScope, element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery,
                attrs:ng.IAttributes, formCtrl:{[key:string]:any}) {
        scope.input = formCtrl[scope.name];
    }
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
